alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:43PM EST until February 21 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .The river has crested and is falling. It is forecast to fall below flood stage Tuesday. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 382.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Monday was 383.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 373.3 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 382.1 feet on 12/12/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
